text: @realDonaldTrump Corrupt Joe??? How about corrupt Trump & his life as a career criminal?  How about Trump who it appears so far knew Putin was going to assassinate American soldiers & tried to hide it (Just like he tried to hide the coronavirus)?  You are lower than dirt & dirtier than filth.
